Yup.

::Firearm::

Firearm tries to spin out of the way of the shots, but the gravity 
field prevents him from doing so. He is hit by all four (two shots 
from a double barrell, I think), sending him flipping up through the 
air.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Firearm's charges are explosive, right?
> 
> ::Drag Strip/Dead-End::
> Drag Strip dodges the first charge, and takes the second in his 
> shoulder, slightly damaging his armour, and blasting him back. He 
> lands, rolls, and jumps up taking to the air, firing two more 
blasts 
> from his double-barrel plasma gun.
> 
> Dead-End spins also taking to the air, and shoots his gravity gun, 
> boosting the gravitational field in Firearm's surrounding area.
